about_the_game:
Add more helpful merchants, commanding directors, and plot-heavy nurses to your games with the RPG Character Pack 14! Gee-kun-soft is back with another MZ-styled character pack with 16 new characters to populate your game’s world. 11 women and 5 men are ready to take on important jobs in your story, from nurses who can heal your heroes after dangerous fights to a veteran agent who can offer new quests or teach your heroes a new skill or two if you impress him!

Each character comes with a character sprite, downed sprites, front view battler image with multiple color variations, faceset and bust art each with 8 emotions, and SV battler sheets so you can choose to have each character be as minor or important as you want! And as a bonus, this pack also includes a high-resolution full body art for each character so you can size them to perfectly fit your game or give your players a good look at them in your game’s codex. So if you’ve been wanting a few more NPCs in their work uniforms or need to add some uniquely skilled party members to the team, check out the RPG Character Pack 14!


Contents:

RPG-style 11 female and 5 male characters includes:

* battlers and busts
* facesets with 8 emotions each
* SV-animated battlers, walking sprites and bonus portraits


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
